settings.heading: ABOUT THE SHOP
settings.subtext:
Kurativ CBD was founded in 2018 with a simple goal in mind â€“ to bring high quality CBD products to market at a reasonable price. Since day one, we have prided ourselves on sourcing only premium, U.S. grown hemp for our extracts. Our team works tirelessly to bring new and innovative products for our amazing customers. Our mission is to help people, and that mission is ongoing and incredibly rewarding. Thanks for joining us.

Representations regarding the efficacy and safety of Kurativ CBD have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, prevent, treat, or cure any disease. Consult your physician prior to use if you are pregnant, nursing or using other medications.
